doc.subject: Re: Confirmation needed
doc.body: Dear Shivaan Motilal Thank you for choosing CFD Global Please kindly be informed that we received your request and we do appreciate the effort In this situation our relevant department will proceed accordingly in order to refund your deposit to your Credit Card 5051 After this step will be fully completed we will proceed with your account closure as well For additional help please contact us Best Regards image logo David V Customer Support p e support cfdglobal com w cfdglobal com https www cfdglobal com utm source email utm medium email signature utm campaign CFD Global Email Signature a Key Way Investments Ltd https www google ro maps place Santiclair Building Diagorou Nicosia Cyprus 35 1690428 33 3551266 17z data 3m1 4b1 4m12 1m6 3m5 1s0x14de1750d6eaaccd 0xdce329513d4e58cf 2sChanteclair Serviced Apartment 8m2 3d35 1691623 4d33 3572893 3m4 1s0x14de1750d46427dd 0xdef7c5d62125c0ab 8m2 3d35 1690449 4d33 3573381 hl en Cfdglobal com is a brand owned and operated by Key Way Investments Ltd a company authorized and licensed by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission under license no 292 16 HIGH RISK INVESTMENT WARNING Trading Foreign Exchange Forex and Contracts for Differences CFD s is highly speculative carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors You may sustain a loss of some or all of your invested capital therefore you should not speculate with capital that you cannot afford to lose You should be aware of all the risks associated with trading on margin Please read the Risk Disclosure Document which gives you a fuller explanation of some of the risks involved This communication is provided for information purposes only and does not constitute a solicitation for the wrappurpose of purchase of sale of any financial instrument All information contained is gathered from reputable sources and is not intended to be used as investment advice However we do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information provided we are not liable to any client for the accuracy of the information or for any inaccuracies Confidentiality Note This communication including any attachments is sent on behalf of Key Way Investments Ltd It contains information which is confidential and privileged If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender immediately and destroy any copies of this communication Unless expressly stated to the contrary nothing in this communication constitutes a contractual offer capable of acceptance or indicates an intention to create legal relations or grant any rights Key Way Investments Group monitors communications sent or received by it for security and other purposes Any views or opinions presented are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of the Key Way Investments Ltd On Tue Jul 10 2018 at 3 04 PM Shivaan Motilal shivaanmotilal gmail com wrote Dear CFD Global David V I am not sure if you read my previous email I would like to cancel my account and withdraw all funds that I have deposited Since my account is not verified this should be possible without additional fees being charged I was promised a 1 1 consultation yesterday but this did not happen and there was no contact to inform me of it being canceled I just want my money back I will not be continuing this any further and not providing any more documents I would just like the funds that I deposited to be returned back to me a sum of R1370 Regards Shivaan On Tue Jul 10 2018 at 1 39 PM Support Team support cfdglobal com wrote Dear Shivaan Motilal Thank you for choosing CFD Global Please kindly be informed that our relevant department verified the documents you have provided so far Still for the verification procedure to be fully accomplished we require you to send the following Your Proof of Residence needs to be a full copy of one of the following Bank or credit card statement One of the following Utility Bills water electricity gas phone and must clearly show these details Your full name Your address of residence please note this address should match the one you entered during registration Date of Issue of the document Please note that we do not accept any Proof or Residence issued over 6 months ago Your SECURE Card back copy On the back side we need first 4 digits visible security code covered the 3 small digits CVV2 signature on the specific strip After all your documents will be verified and accepted the funds will be available for trading into your account and you will also receive a phone call from your Account Representative For additional help please contact us Best Regards image logo David V Customer Support p e support cfdglobal com w cfdglobal com https www cfdglobal com utm source email utm medium email signature utm campaign CFD Global Email Signature a Key Way Investments Ltd https www google ro maps place Santiclair Building Diagorou Nicosia Cyprus 35 1690428 33 3551266 17z data Global I would like to cancel my account and withdraw all funds that I have deposited Since my account is not verified this should be possible without additional fees being charged I was promised a 1 1 consultation yesterday but this did not happen and there was no contact to inform me of it being cancelled I just want my money back Regards Shivaan On Fri Jul 6 2018 at 6 19 PM CFDGlobal support cfdglobal com wrote image Cfd Logo Thanks for choosing CFDGlobal Dear Shivaan Motilal Thanks for choosing CFDGlobal Based on the information you have provided us during the account registration you have been classified as a Retail Client For further information regarding this classification please refer to the Retail Client Agreement https www cfdglobal com en terms and conditions Please verify your email http www cfdglobal com en confirm email email token 677adee1 7c5c 410f 8931 ca0e75f95560 if you haven t done so already to unlock all the features and benefits we are offering Why Trade with CFDGlobal State of the art online trading platforms for web mobile and tablet Unlimited demo account to practice trading strategies Tight spreads with zero commission Unparalleled support and customer care GET STARTED http www cfdglobal com en login Carries risk of capital loss Please familiarize yourself with our Conflict of Interest Policy https www cfdglobal com en conflict interest policy along with trading conditions for CFD https www cfdglobal com trading products spreads and FX https www cfdglobal com trading products spreads During account registration you have acknowledged reading and accepting the following documents Terms and Conditions Client Agreement https www cfdglobal com en terms and conditions Risk Disclosure https www cfdglobal com en risk disclosure Privacy Policy Statement https www cfdglobal com en privacy policy Best regards Support Department Email support cfdglobal com Tel 44 203 769 2578 HIGH RISK INVESTMENT WARNING Leveraged trading in foreign currency contracts contracts for difference or other off exchange products carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for everyone Before trading you are strongly advised to read and ensure that you understand the relevant risk disclosures and warnings here Risk Disclosure Statement https www cfdglobal com en risk disclosure There is a substantial risk that you may lose all of your initial investment We advise you to consider whether trading leveraged products is appropriate for you in light of your own personal circumstances We recommend that you seek independent financial advice and ensure that you fully understand all risks involved before trading Trading through an online platform carries additional risks Refer to our Regulation section here https www cfdglobal com company legal documents CFDGLOBAL com is a website owned and operated by KeyWay Investements Limited which is authorized and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission http www cysec gov cy en GB home license number 292 16 http www cysec gov cy en GB entities investment firms cypriot 77479 Office Address 2 Sofouli Street Chanteclair Building 6th Floor Office 602 Nicosia Cyprus Restricted Jurisdictions We do not establish accounts to residents of certain jurisdictions including Japan Canada and USA For further details please see Terms Conditions https www cfdglobal com en
